location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A group of Burmese students on Friday marched out of the Yangon Institute of Technology ( YIT ) in the northern outskirts of Rangoon and moved toward the University of Yangon about six km ( four miles ) away , witnesses said .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| northern outskirts of Rangoon |
| Yangon Institute of Technology (YIT) |
| about six km (four miles) away |
| University of Yangon |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| northern outskirts of Rangoon |
| Yangon Institute of Technology (YIT) |
| about six km (four miles) away |
| University of Yangon |

Explanation:

* "witnesses said" is not a location.
* "on Friday" and "moved toward" are not locations.
* "about six km (four miles)" is a distance, but it refers to the location of the University of Yangon in relation to YIT, so it is included as a location in the table.
